entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as a house that had got off, implying it was one of the four houses in Hogwarts. ("Slytherin had got off")

entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog is mentioned as an animal who said something to Harry. ("He was becoming drowsy when what seemed like their very last hope occurred to him and he suddenly sat bolt upright. He was thinking about what Aragog said.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who lay down and thought about what Aragog said. ("He was becoming drowsy when what seemed like their very last hope occurred to him and he suddenly sat bolt upright. He was thinking about what Aragog said.")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the person who woke up with a yelp when Harry called out to him. ("‘Ron,’ he hissed through the dark. ‘Ron!’ Ron woke with a yelp like Fang’s")

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is mentioned as an animal whose yelp Ron had when he woke up. ("Ron woke with a yelp like Fang’s")

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as the person who was snoring in the corner. ("‘Ron – that girl who died. Aragog said she was found in a bathroom,’ said Harry , ignoring Neville’s snuffling snores from the corner.")

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: Moaning Myrtle is mentioned as a person who died and whose body might still be in the bathroom. ("‘You don’t think – not Moaning Myrtle?’")

relationships.description: Harry thought about what Aragog said. ("He was becoming drowsy when what seemed like their very last hope occurred to him and he suddenly sat bolt upright. He was thinking about what Aragog said.")
Harry called out to Ron in the dark. ("‘Ron,’ he hissed through the dark. ‘Ron!’")
Ron woke up when Harry called out to him. ("Ron woke with a yelp like Fang’s, stared wildly around and saw Harry.")
Harry ignored Neville's snoring in the corner. ("‘Ron – that girl who died. Aragog said she was found in a bathroom,’ said Harry , ignoring Neville’s snuffling snores from the corner.")
Harry speculated that Moaning Myrtle's body might still be in the bathroom. ("‘You don’t think – not Moaning Myrtle?’")
